resources.string: Poutine Quest
In this game, you play a potato who needs to turn his life around by completing three challenges.
START
Introduction
You lay in bed.
You’re 32, broke, and jobless.
To top it off, you’ve been single for over 10 years.
Suddenly, a revelation hits you.
You live in the magical land of poutine, Poutineland, governed by Sir Vladimir Poutine.
Everyone who lives here worships the Canadian delicacy and its ingredients: fries, cheese curds, and gravy.
20 years ago, the best poutine-maker in the land passed away.
His name was Sir Spiriden Poutine, Sir Vladimir Poutine’s grandfather.
In his will, he wrote that whoever could pass his three challenges would be able to inherit the recipe.
Currently, no one has been able to pass even a single challenge.
If you could inherit the legendary recipe, it would solve all your problems.
And so, you set out to seek the 3 guardians who guard the recipe…
You find the first guardian, Monsieur Pompous Potato, in the city.
\"Ze first challenge is verrrry simple.\"
\"I \'ave just made a new batch of fries.\"
\"Each fry iz supposed to be identical, \'owever, there were some... mistakes.\"
Challenge 1
Your job is to identify the fries that do not look like the others.
(There are a total of 3 rounds, 3 tries each. Tap the fries that do not belong.)
Round 1
Round 2
Round 3
Check the faces!
Check the alignment of the fries!
Check the color!
\"OH. EM. GEE. I can\'t believe you actually managed to complete it! \"
\"I know you must get going, but feel free to visit anytime! \"
\"Also... please sign my forehead... \"
You find the second guardian, Madame Cherubic Cheese, on the outskirts of town.
\"Hi there cutiepie, I see you passed the first challenge.\"
\"The second challenge is a bit more... precarious.\"
\"I\'d like you to take care of a pest.\"
Challenge 2
Choose three pieces of equipment to take with you to defeat the monster!
Hint: it\'s a cheese monster!
First, Madame Cheese brings out two spoons: a wooden spoon and a plastic spoon.
Choose your shield
Wooden Spoon
Plastic Spoon
Next, Madame Cheese brings out two utensils: a knife and a fork.
Choose your weapon
Sharp Knife
Pointy Fork
Finally, Madame Cheese goes into the kitchen and grabs two items: a flamethrower and a bottle of lemon juice.
Choose your special attack
Blow Torch
Lemon Juice
Next ->
As you approach the giant cheese, it starts pelting cheese curds at you.
You hold up your wooden spoon in defense…
You hold up your plastic spoon in defense…
Boom, boom! Your wooden spoon looks like it’s just barely enough to shield you from its attacks.
You better start attacking before it breaks!
SNAP! Your plastic spoon was smashed into little pieces.
The last thing you see is the cheese monster slowly approaching…
As the cheese takes a break from attacking, you rush up to attack.
You draw your knife and attack…
You draw your fork and attack…
Slash, slash! You managed to wound the cheese!
Now to finish him off!
Poke, poke! Your fork does literally nothing against the cheese.
The last thing you see is the cheese monster slowly approaching…
The cheese is staggering from the pain of its wounds.
You take out your blow torch to deliver the final blow.
You take out your lemon juice to deliver the final blow.
Spritz, spritz! The lemon juice trickles down the cheese without affecting it.
The last thing you see is the cheese monster slowly approaching…
Whooooooooooshhhhhh! The heat from the blow torch quickly melts the cheese.
You’ve won!
\"Hey there hotshot, I can\'t believe you actually did it.\"
\"Feel free to come back to my cozy cottage anytime~\"
\"I\'ll give you premium house service~\"
The third guardian, Monsieur(???) Grumbling Graving, is by Spiridon’s tombstone.
\"… tombstone… last words… \"
\"… must solve… riddle… \"
\"… get recipe… \"
Challenge 3
For the final challenge, you must solve a series of riddles.
If you need help, there\'s a hint button!

I\'m a common breakfast food!
egg

It turns into another vegetable!
squash

It\'s sweet and sugary!
doughnut

\"… congratulations… \"
\"… want recipe…?\"
\"… take… it\’s yours…\"
In front of you lies a chest.
Your blood, sweat, and tears have finally paid off.
You gingerly open the chest to reveal…
The super secret recipe!
As you skim through the wrinkled parchment, you realize that from now on, you’ll be living in luxury.
5 years later…
You’re now a renown poutine-maker.
You’re married and every day is full of happiness.
However, something’s been bothering you…
Aren’t fries… potatoes?
The End
